help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions and learn how to get the most out of NegoceIA.
help.contact_team: Our team is here to help. Contact us for any specific questions.

getting_started.question: How do I get started with NegoceIA ?
getting_started.answer: Simply create a free account, then start your first conversation. Our AI will guide you through the process and adapt to your specific needs.

privacy.question: Are my conversations private and secure?
privacy.answer: Absolutely. All your conversations are encrypted and stored securely. We never share your data with third parties.

types.question: Can I use the tool for different types of negotiations?
types.answer: Yes! Our AI is trained to help you with all types of negotiations: commercial, salary, partnerships, fundraising, etc.

improvement.question: How does the AI improve my skills?
improvement.answer: The AI analyzes your conversations, identifies your strengths and weaknesses, then offers personalized advice and adapted exercises.

limits.question: Is there a limit to the number of conversations?
limits.answer: No, you can create as many conversations as you want. Each conversation is saved in your history.

export.question: Can I export my conversations?
export.answer: This feature will be available soon. You'll be able to export your conversations as PDF for offline viewing.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Our team is here to support you in your negotiation learning journey.

success.title: Message sent!
success.message: Thank you for your message. Our team will respond as soon as possible.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: At NegoceIA, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

data_collected.title: Data collected
data_collected.subtitle: Information we collect:
data_collected.account_info: Account information: name, email address, encrypted password
data_collected.conversations: Conversations: your exchanges with AI to improve the service
data_collected.technical_data: Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system

data_usage.title: Data usage
data_usage.subtitle: We use your data to:
data_usage.provide_services: Provide and improve our AI services
data_usage.analytics: Analyze usage to improve our features

data_protection.title: Data protection
data_protection.subtitle: Security measures:
data_protection.encryption: Encryption: all data is encrypted in transit and at rest
data_protection.limited_access: Limited access: only authorized personnel can access data
data_protection.audits: Audits: regular security audits by third parties

your_rights.title: Your rights
your_rights.subtitle: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
your_rights.access: Right of access: view your personal data
your_rights.rectification: Right of rectification: correct your information
your_rights.erasure: Right to erasure: delete your account and data
your_rights.portability: Right to portability: export your data
your_rights.objection: Right to object: object to processing

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: For any questions regarding this policy or your personal data:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: By using NegoceIA, you agree to these terms of service. Please read them carefully before using our service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using NegoceIA, you agree to be bound by these terms of service and our privacy policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

service_description.title: Service description
service_description.subtitle: NegoceIA is a service that provides:
service_description.ai_assistant: An AI assistant for negotiation learning
service_description.platform: A platform for saving your conversations

acceptable_use.title: Acceptable use
acceptable_use.learning: Use the service for learning and training purposes
acceptable_use.feedback: Share your feedback with our team
acceptable_use.professional: Use the service in a professional context
acceptable_use.illegal: Use the service for illegal or malicious purposes
acceptable_use.copying: Copy or redistribute our content without permission

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.disclaimer: NegoceIA is a learning tool. The advice provided does not constitute professional legal or financial advice.
liability.as_is: The service is provided "as is" without warranty
liability.accuracy: We do not guarantee the accuracy of AI advice
liability.own_risk: You use the service at your own risk
liability.limited: Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service
